lead_paragraph: Canada won its first world hockey championship since 2007, while the United States beat the Czech Republic to claim the bronze medal.

headline.print_headline: Russia Cedes World Title to Canada
headline.main: Russia Cedes World Title to Canada

snippet: Canada won its first world hockey championship since 2007, while the United States beat the Czech Republic to claim the bronze medal.
abstract: Canada men's hockey team defeats Russia, 6-1, to win world hockey championship.
